Who is the actor that helped kindergarten kids flee the Nashville school shooting?
Melissa Joan Hart
What is Melissa Joan Hart famous for?
Her role on Sabrina the Teenage Witch
How many people were killed in the Nashville school shooting?
Six
What was the relation between the victims?
Three children and three members of staff
Who was the shooter?
A former student of the Covenant School
What did Melissa Joan Hart and her husband do to help?
Helped kids cross the road, get their teachers, and reunite with their mom
Where was Melissa Joan Hart going when she encountered the children?
A conference at her child's school
What school did Hart's children attend?
A neighboring school to the Covenant School
What connection does Hart have to the Sandy Hook school shooting?
Her family lived near the school in Connecticut
Which nonprofit groups has Hart attended rallies for?
Moms Demand Action and Everytown for Gun Safety
